successes.title: Slice : A media player and more by Five Ninjas
successes.description: The user friendly media player with internal storage and a Raspberry Pi heart. Load it with anything, use it anywhere.

Pledges.description: 'Watch & Listen' - Get updates and info as we develop and a fully arranged version of the Slice video music as a thank you!

'Remote Control' - Be one of the first to get our custom 2.4GHz wireless remote. This remote is great for any XBMC install with a USB port. We'll also include an HD Slice wallpaper, regular updates and Slice Mp3. Free worldwide shipping

'Preview' - (No Disk Included) Want to grab Slice as early as possible? Get one of our preview models. Identical to the retail version of Slice - just install your own hard drive - this one is for the developers, hackers and tech savvy. These will be first out of the door! Includes all accessories, black anodised aluminium case, handy case tools and basic packaging. Worldwide shipping included.

'Preview' Extended Offer - (No Disk Included) Want to grab Slice as early as possible? Get one of our preview models. Identical to the retail version of Slice - just install your own hard drive - this one is for the developers, hackers and tech savvy. These will be first out of the door! Includes all accessories, black anodised aluminium case, handy case tools and basic packaging. WORLDWIDE SHIPPING INCLUDED.

'Disk-less Version' - (No Hard Disk Included) Identical to the retail version of Slice - just install your own hard drive - this one is for the developers, hackers and tech savvy. Comes with full OS/Software installed, all accessories, aluminium case, handy case tools and full retail packaging. FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING INCLUDED.

'Early Bird' - A fully loaded Slice with first come first served discount. These are limited so don't hang about! Comes with Aluminium case, 1TB hard drive, accessories and full retail packaging. Includes free worldwide shipping.
'Early Bird 2' - A fully loaded Slice with first come first served discount. These are limited so don't hang about! Comes with Aluminium case, 1TB hard drive, accessories and full retail packaging.

'Early Bird 3' - A Full Slice with first come first served discount. This is identical to the Full Slice with a great saving. These are limited so move fast! Comes with Aluminium case, 1TB hard drive, accessories and full retail packaging. Includes FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING
'Full Slice' - Everything you need to get started, shipped lovingly to you. Aluminium case, 1TB hard drive, accessories and full retail packaging. Includes free worldwide shipping.

'2TB Option' - This is for those of you with lots of media! Everything you need to get started, shipped lovingly to you. Aluminium case, with an extra large 2TB hard drive, accessories and full retail packaging. Includes FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING.

'Double Slice' - Get two fully loaded Slice players with a great saving. Two of everything shipped lovingly to you. Aluminium case, 1TB hard drive, accessories and full retail packaging. Includes free worldwide shipping.

'Limited Edition' - This unique version of Slice is made from sustainable and reclaimed hard woods. Each one is hand finished and one of a kind. Complete with laser etched FiveNinjas branding and creator signatures. Includes all the accessories, 1TB hard drive.
